post:
OpenVirtuals – OpenVZ VPS starting at $16/year in Seattle, USA

openvirtuals.com, openvz, seattle, ssh, USA September 7, 2015 @ 1:00 pm, by Jonathan Tan

Eric, from OpenVirtuals, is back with OpenVZ offers to celebrate the grand opening of their new location in Seattle, USA! This promotion gives 50% off their regular price while having 28% more disk space compared to their previous features. Hurry because these stocks are limited. I wish to say congratulations to OpenVirtuals and we hope our readers would love the new location!

Aside from the new location, Eric told us that they updated some of their most popular templates. They have also added an OnlyOffice template – which is a multifunctional portal for business collaboration, document and project management. He also told us that monthly promos from their past features are still active.

Mini-CACHED

  • 256MB RAM
  • 512MB vSwap
  • 1 CPU Core
  • 90GB Disk space
  • SSD-cached
  • 1TB Bandwidth
  • 1 Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4 address
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • $16/year
  • Order here
Standard-CACHED

  • 512MB RAM
  • 1024MB vSwap
  • 2 CPU Cores
  • 180GB Disk space
  • SSD-cached
  • 2TBBandwidth
  • 1 Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4 address
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • $20/year
  • Order here
Professional-CACHED

  • 1024MB RAM
  • 2048MB vSwap
  • 4 CPU Cores
  • 270GB Disk space
  • SSD-cached
  • 3TB Bandwidth
  • 1 Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4 address
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • $40/year
  • Order here

OpenVirtuals is a service of Intercom Online, a U.S. company with more than 20 years (since 1993) of providing voice and data solutions. Intercom Online is a C Corporation registered in New York State and headquartered at 42 Broadway, New York, NY. OpenVirtuals was started in 2012 and their domain was registered at about the same time. To those interested, their WHOIS information is public They have been featured here at LEB numerous times starting way back in 2013. We wish OpenVirtuals all the best and we encourage our readers to share their opinion at the comments section below.

OpenVirtuals has pre-made templates for popular installations such as: 64 bit Linux OSes, development frameworks like Ruby on Rails, web applications like WordPress, and specially tailored templates for their Mini 256 MB plans. For developers, their provide a new Mobile Developer Kit template that integrates Cordova and Cloud9 technologies – providing a seamless development environment for Android, Blackberry, Amazon Fire and Firefox OS.

Here are some of their available templates based on Ubuntu 14.04 64 bit version: Drupal 7.38-1, Joomla 3.4.3-1, WordPress 4.2.3, MediaWiki 1.23.5-0, LAMP Stack 5.4.34, LAPP Stack 5.4.34, Tomcat Stack 7.0.56, Ruby Stack 2.0.0, JRuby Stack 1.7.16, Django Stack 1.6.7, MEAN Stack 2.6.4, ownCloud 7.0.2 , ISPConfig 3.0.5.4p8, OnlyOffice.

OpenVirtuals accepts PayPal and any credit card that can be used via PayPal. They have a 10-day or 10GB traffic money back guarantee. Servers will be provisioned instantly (depending on host node availability) and all servers come with a 100% uptime guarantee supported by a ‘generous SLA’. Kindly read their Terms Of Service, Acceptable Use Policy, and Service Level Agreement here before making any purchase.
